attributes.action: allow parents, guardians and those in educational authority to discipline, guide and correct children .
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We need to bring back the parents/guardians/teachers right to discipline, guide and correct children. Boundaries and deterents need to be set-up. We, as responsible caring adults, need to help the young generation to grow-up knowing the difference between what is right and wrong, what is acceptable and unacceptable behaviour with respect before it is too late. Whilst children need to be protected from any form of abuse, parents/guardians/teachers, should not be made to accept the governments attitude on 'smacking'.
